name: Single filer - Very high income with Additional Medicare Tax
description: Single person earning $300,000 annually - subject to additional Medicare tax

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 IRS tax tables and FICA rates
sources.notes: Taxable income: $300,000 - $15,750 = $284,250. Tax calculated through brackets up to 35% bracket. SS: capped at $176,100 * 6.2% = $10,918.20. Medicare: 1.45% of $300,000 = $4,350. Additional Medicare: 0.9% of ($300,000 - $200,000) = 0.9% of $100,000 = $900
